feedback:
Bonjour Diogo Ramos,


Merci pour le partage.
Actuellement le titre ne correspond pas à notre ligne de programmation.

N'hésitez pas à nous envoyer vos prochains sons.

Bonne continuation,


André
Le Labo

Un message touchant, développé sur une onde musicale légère et pleine d'oxygène. Direction musicale trop folklorique cependant bien que des pistes attachantes en résultent ça et là durant votre disque.
Bonjour ! Merci beaucoup pour l'envoi ! On n'est pas totalement séduit par le morceau mais une prochaine fois peut-être :)
Bonjour. Merci pour cette fraîcheur et cet hymne à la liberté en ces moments si incertains. Musicalement c(est parfait; orchestration et interprétation sont au top. Je diffuse. Manuel

Salut Diogo, alors c'est un peu éloigné de ce qu'on a l'habitude de partager mais j'ai été séduit par votre univers et le timbre de la voix, on va partager en playlist et j'ai été liker et commenter sur Youtube :)

Bonjour
Merci le titre est très frais! Mais malheureusement ce n'est pas la ligne editoriale de notre magazine.
Bonne continuation

Une chanson qui nous fait voyager dans des contrées chaleureuses. Le texte est emprunt de liberté et cela fait du bien ces durs.
Malheureusement la track s'éloigne de notre univers, mais merci pour ce partage qui donne du baume au coeur !

Bonjour,

Excellent morceau alliant la langue française aux sonorités brésiliennes... Votre morceau donne envie de danser et les gens en ont grandement besoin en ce moment !

Obrigado pour ce voyage à Rio :)

LR
c'est très agréable à écouter, et les mélodies sont belles, mais le morceau ne me semble pas très original ou moderne , désolé

C'est vrai qu'est ce qu'on l'aime la liberté waw
Merci pour ce morceau cool !
Pourriez vous me l'envoyer en mp3 sur mon mail (qui bug moins que l'interface de groover) afin de le diffuser sur les bonnes ondes de radio galère (marseille) ? 
Merci !

Hello and thanks for sharing your music with us. Honestly is  beautiful track and we are pretty sure you'll find your way with it. Concerning us is far from what we broadcast on the radio. Basically we are looking for another type of sound to the radio. We wish you the best with it ! Thanks.
Hello, we have listened to your track. Unfortunately we did not have the crush. Good continuation!
Hi! I liked the song, it has a nice beat. The lyrics are also interesting. Unfortunately, I still don't have a list with that mood! Good luck!

Hello, 

Merci pour ce partage, c'est une chouette chanson. Malheureusement, elle ne correspond pas à la ligne éditoriale de CAPSAO (latino-pop/festif-club). 

A bientôt,

Hi

Hey, jolie voix néanmoins le rythme s'écarte de l'esprit "chill" que recherchent nos viewers. À bientôt, j'espère !
Salut Diogo, nous sommes désolés mais ce titre ne correspond pas vraiment à ce que nous recherchons actuellement. Bonne continuation. Pierre
Hey, thanks for sending out. We’ll pass on that one unfortunately - really interesting but not a firm yes. Surely on a forthcoming project!

Hello
Thanks for the proposal,
The production is good but too mainstream for our channel.
Best regards
some really nice vocals here but overall the melody was too pop oriented for us as well as the lyrics. bassline also felt too fast for the BPM

Overall i think that the track is good and that you have used good sounds for the production! I like the rythm and the chord progression is nice. The bass line is really nice and groovy! Probably what caught my attention the most. :) Good and catchy vocals as well, i think the lyrics are great and the chorus is good and easy to sing along to. - Big plus! Nice and catchy lead melody as well. Good arrengement of the track and the production sounds good with a clean mix & master. Unfortunately i'm afraid that the track does not really match the style & vibe of my playlist tho. Personally i like the track and i think that it's a good song, but as a playlist curator i must always consider that a song perfectly matches the style & vibe of the playlist i'm curating. Therefore i am kindly declining your submission this time. I wish you the best and good luck with the track nonetheless!
Hi thanks for submitting, I really like the production and hooks on here. Unfortunately the song does not quite fit the style of the playlist. Good luck in the future!

I like the song a lot actually! Such a mess that the overall production lacks a lot of clarity in the mix. Maybe think about hiring a mixing engineer next time. I actually am one myself, I will add the link to hire me for a low price on another platform if you want to! :) just send me a mail to get more informations about my services (like vocal tuning etc.). Because that way, the song quality is just not on a sharable level which is really dragging down the actual good overall song.
Very good, I really liked the music, and the whole production, we will certainly include it in our playlist on Spotify!

Hey Glass Animals! Big floor filler this one, if Blondie was a product of 2021 she'd sound like this for sure.

The dirty beat under the sleek synths are awesome, great vocals, i really like what you have done here. Will share on Twitter over next few days, bravo!

hello there Glass Spells! I like the synths used in this one. You find some good harmonies. I like your vocal melody as well. Unfortunately the track doesn't quite fit the genre of my playlists but keep going!

That's a realy good song! When it beggins  you fell like in a 80's thriller movie, and that feeling continues throughout the song, even when the music explodes into something energetic and dancing . Plus, the catchy chorus, makes you want to get up on your feet and start to jump, singing and dancing.
This is fun although feels a bit familiar, would be keen to hear more, but we're only covering Scottish linked acts so I guess drop me a shout of you ever tour over here when that's a thing again.

Thanks for the submission and hope you’re well. Pretty atmospheric track, I like the downtempo beats, crisp synth/string layers and the vocal has a beautifully emotive edge. Overall a contemplative sound but not contemporary enough for my core playlists unfortunately. Best of luck with the rest of your promo campaign.

Cool tune, but it doesn't fit the the music genre we play on RTB. 
There are great melodic ideas on the song but I think it needs more attention to the sound desing/production and to the English pronunciation.
Hey there, Really nice song and vocals but it feels too pop for my playlists to be honest. I wish you the best of luck with the release!
Hey! Nice strings, but I think the vocal should be more in focus :) Thanks and good luck!

Dear GENU,

I have to admit I really liked how you changed from spoken to singing ! 
Although "Come Closer" is a unique track (in a really nice way), I felt a few things could have been a bit different; if I may :

a) I would have really like for a more controlled low end. Also, maybe cutting also the highs of the bass could have made more space for the guitar body !
b) I would have also really liked for a bit of more chords progressions, as they sound felt a bit repetitive after a while.
c) Moreover, I would have really liked parts to come in go (i.e. 2nd verse if only the bass was present) !

Not a bad track at all, but I felt production and arrangement wise it could have been a bit better.

I'm really sorry I will have to pass on "Come Closer" for now.
Can't but thank you for your submission and wish you all the success with this one !
interesting mix of sounds there , really like it  ! please send me the track when it release  , kind regards !

Hello,

Your music is interesting but we are not seduced enough for a sharing.

We wish you good luck.

cordially

Trakmix.
Hi, i listen to your song and i like it but i don't see a Spotify link for your track. Thanks a lot for the interest and good luck with your project!

Hola socio es un placer saludarte, he escuchado tu música y me parece increíble, beats y sonidos muy versátiles con una agradable armonía, felicidades es una increíble canción y aunque no son justamente los beats que estoy buscando en este momento aprecio tu buena música, saludos y estaré al pendiente o

Hi,

Some interesting sound designs in this one. Personally I am searching for something more melodic. I thought that also the mix could use some more variation. Especially the drums it feels that it are the same 4-5 drums playing over and over again. Maybe and added top loop, some automation... could help a lot. 

Wish you all the best!

Cheers,

Jens

Bonjour et merci de votre sollicitation. Je n'ai pas été entièrement emballé par la topline/mélodie de chant ni par le sujet. Je trouve que le tout manque de crédibilité dans le sens où je n'arrive pas à entendre "l émotion " voulue . Nostalgie ? Tristesse ? Dérive alcoolique ? J'ai le sentiment d'entendre un titre un peu gratuit donc l'objectif consiste à "sonner" plus qu'a parler à l'auditeur.

Une track super bien produite avec un excellent flow. L'instrumental est vraiment top et le tout est vraiment prometteur.
Celle-ci s'éloigne de ce que nous avons l'habitude de partager, mais nous sommes convaincus qu'elle saura trouver son public.

Hello,

Le track est vraiment cool je rajoute à ma playlist Pop Urbaine !

Chris

Merci pour le partage

YANNICK TEAM BME
Refrain trop chanté pour ce qu'on recherche en priorité. Sinon bon potentiel, morceau intéressant. On garde un œil sur les sorties à venir! Bon courage 💪

Salut,

La prod est mélancolique, triste, entraînante, dansante. Lyricalement, c'est un texte conscient, riche en émotions, introspectif. Les flows sont bien maîtrisés, on se laisse facilement emporter par les vibes et la mélo du morceau. Le refrain est entêtant et c'est ce qui fonctionne actuellement. Par contre j'ai une impression que le format "radio - hit" a été fait mais pas forcément de manière naturelle. J'aime bien les intonations de voix, qui, pour moi, rendent le texte vivant. Visuellement, on est en cohérence avec le morceau, c'est plutôt bien retranscrit, que ce soit les couleurs, les doutes etc... bien réalisé, bien monté.

Bonjour et merci pour ce nouveau titre.
Bon projet même si la tonalité générale du morceau ne s'inscrit pas  totalement dans l'esprit de notre playlist du moment.

Salut ! 
Le son que vous nous avez envoyé est franchement prometteur, le clip est bien travaillé, l'instru colle parfaitement au flow. Envoyez un format story insta lorsque le son sortira. 

N'hésitez pas à nous partager plus de bons sons ;)

Merci pour ce nouveau morceau...mais ça ne correspond pas à notre ligne éditoriale: la mélodie est trop mainstream pour nous, surtout le refrain, sans parler de l'autotune.
Désolée mais je passe mon tour!
En tout cas, je vous souhaite le meilleur avec votre projet!

Bonjour merci de votre proposition, malheureusement après écoute le titre ne rentre pas en programmation sur notre antenne. Bonne continuation
 Bryan

Bonjour,

Dans un premier temps merci de votre prise de contact auprès de l’équipe d’aficia.

J’ai ici le plaisir de vous confirmer que nous avons fait le choix d’intégrer votre titre dans l’une de nos playlists thématiques. Cette intégration sera effectuée rapidement et en fonction de la disponibilité de votre titre.

Nos playlists sont mises en avant sur l’ensemble de nos réseaux sociaux comme sur notre site. Elles restent disponibles sur Deezer, Spotify, Apple Music et SoundCloud.

Un lien vous sera transmis dès l’intégration de votre titre dans nos sélections.

À très vite,
Chris pour aficia.

Hello l'équipe

Notre équipe a écouté et visionné le clip vidéo "Essayer" et ils ont décidé de le relayer sur notre site web.

Cordialement l'équipe vipzone

Bonjour et merci de partager ce son avec nous. Ceci dit nous ne jouons pas de morceaux de tracks contenant de l'AutoTune. Nous recherchons du Hip Hop proche du BoomBap ou de la GFunk. Peut être du Hip Hop qui ne "marche pas" ? On a bien kiffé certaines phases dans les textes, mais globalement c'est trop éloigné du style que l'on diffuse. On vous souhaite le meilleur avec la promo de ce titre. Musicalement.

Bonjour Antes & Madzes,
Merci pour cette agréable découverte !
Dès les premières secondes le projet a su nous plaire.
Le texte est très profond et représentatif du monde actuel, du moins, de ce que nombreux vivent.
Le "c'est pas la peine d'essayer" répétitif est captivant et la mélodie de manière générale est très entraînante.
Votre univers artistique a l'air très intéressant et plein de sens,  nous aimerions vraiment vous interviewer.

Hello Antes et Madzes , merci pour ton envoi. La proposition musicale est intéressante, elle est bien enregistré. Elle est dans la tendance, toutefois elle n'est pas compatible avec notre ligne éditoriale. bon courage

Hello Antes & Madzes, merci pour ton envoi.

Très cool ce morceau. De bonnes variations tout le long et un refrain plein de bonnes vibes :)

On va ajouter avec plaisir dans une de nos playlists ! 

Au plaisir de vous réécouter, bonne soirée :)

Salut,

Tout d'abord merci pour l'envoie de votre titre.

Ce qu'on peut dire d'un point de vue technique, le morceau est correctement mixé, ras à ce niveau là.

Artistiquement, c'est pas mal, le flow est bon et le rap bien executé, après on a pas vraiment accroché aux lyrics ni aux rimes, même si on ressent un potentiel certain.
Y'a un potentiel mais il faut bosser la technique et chercher à se démarquer de la masse en ayant un vraie originalité tant sur le fond que sur la forme.

Force pour la suite.

Salut,
Le morceau est intéressant. Le mix est très bien maitrisé ainsi que le clip(très cool). 

Si vous mettez le morceau disponible sur les plateformes de streaming envoyez moi un message sur mon mail ou mon insta . Je l'ajouterais à la pré-sélection des musiques qui entrent en playlist.

Force à vous

Bonjour Antes & Madzes,
Nous avons aimé ce qui se dégage globalement. La chanson est réussie, le clip vidéo également mais il manque tout de même quelque chose de nouveau, de rare qui vous distingue de ce qui se fait déjà. Le flow de l'artiste par exemple est bon mais un peu classique

Bonjour et merci pour le message,

Le morceau est honnêtement très réussi. Musicalement bien travaillé, bien pensé, de même pour le clip qui fonctionne superbement. J'ai objectivement rien à dire ici, bravo. Néanmoins sur la thématique et la manière dont c'est amené j'ai un peu plus de mal. Le risque de ce genre de morceau est d'être peut être un peu trop naïf dans la manière dont c'est amené, ou en tout cas ça ne me parle pas.

Force à vous !

Le morceau est cool, j'aime beaucoup l'énergie du refrain et le message qu'il véhicule. L'ambiance du clip est hyper cool, de belles images qui correspondent au morceau.

Hello,

Merci pour votre morceau ! 

C'est un bon morceau dans la DA musicale ainsi que dans l'image.

J'ai eu juste un peu plus de mal sur le mix qui est efficace mais pas assez poussé à mon goût.
Ensuite, je vois que vous n'indiquez pas de master, ça manque pour l'apport de volume, de profondeur sur les attaques de refrain et mettre en avant la DA du morceau.

Si vous avez besoin d'un master, je connais quelques bons ingé sons pas trop chère. Votre morceau aurait tout de suite une force de frappe beaucoup plus forte et on rentrerai tout de suite dedans, dès les premières notes.

Bon courage pour la suite, c'est un beau morceau et avec un peu plus de travail dans le mix/master vous pourrez aller plus loin :)

Bien à vous,

Thomas RUEE
KRUMPP

Kofton Music.

i thought that the sound design is real solid, it's all around a good production. thing is that there lack this huge and exuberant moment in the track that can perhaps give it that big big lift. thanks for sharing your music with me nonetheless

Cool synth work, I like the production but the arrangement is a little mellow to me. Just my opinion. Thank you for sharing.

Hey! Thanks for sending your music! Hi thanks for you submission, I really dig the artwork it's super cool. The instrumental is very nice but It's sad that the vocals aren't mixed so well. Hey guys, thanks for submitting the track, Gabriel from YMX here!

Hello, thank you for submitting. The song is a bit too quirky for me tastes. Mix-wise, it's nice for a lo-fi song, but could do with a bit more power and clarity if looking for a slightly more popular audience.

Hi Chillers inc!

Thank you for submitting!

Interesting sound! I enjoyed the theremin-like sound of the intro, it had a really nice effect on the whole sound of the track.

I enjoyed that you took the time to introduce the vocals, they really had an interesting effect on the whole sound and had a distinct vibe which I enjoyed.

The whole vibe of the track is interesting, I enjoy the arrangements, they assemble quite well and give the track a very nice identity.

Overall I enjoyed the track, although I don't feel it really vibes that much with the sound of my playlist, but I'm sure it will fit quite nicely in lots of other lists.

Thank you again for submitting!

Hi guys,

Hello and thank you for sending your music. A joy of a track to listen to, captivating, soothing and refreshingly enchanting. Hello Chillers Inc, thank you for sharing your track.

It sounds like The Adams Family would if they started a band, something a little spooky!

I thought it was a pure instrumental at first such was the long intro. The vocals give the track an extra dynamic of course.

This is a little slow for me, i favour a catchy chorus on a snappier shorter song ideally. However those that prefer something a little quirky or different will no doubt find the unique soundscapes on offer here very unique and attractive.

Not one for me on this occasion but all the very best for 2021.

Really great vibe to this piece.
Good job with production and vocal delivery.
'The Music' is not quite a fit with our station, but we'd definitely like to hear more from Chillers INC!

Dear R-IK,

Although "Desole" is a very solid production, I felt a few things could have been different; if I may :

a) Intro was a bit too big, especially for a song of your genre. I would have really liked it shorter !
b) I was not a big fan of the guitar and bass pad being panned so much to the left. I would have gone for a more balanced Left-Right mix.
c) Last but not least, I would have really liked for a more natural guitar sound !

With all these being, I'm really sorry I will have to pass on "Desole".
Can't but thank you for your submission and wish you all the success in 2021 !

Bonjour Lortigo / Thibaut 
 
S’il vous plaît noter que le commentaire est mon opinion professionnelle en tant que producteur de musique et ingénieur du son. Rien n’est personnel, mais seulement des conseils directs et des pensées de l’amélioration possible de la chanson. Aussi des commentaires sur ce qui est mieux sur la chanson, et aussi ce qui pourrait être mieux encore.

Votre chanson « Lortigo Festival Belgium » a une bonne introduction avec une bonne musique de Psy Trance. Le son de la chanson est bon à apprécier avec de bons instruments de basse et de batterie, qui est bien joué tout au long de la chanson. 

Quant à la voix échantillonnée, il s’agit d’un bon échantillon de voix masculine de base. La voix s’adapte à la chanson, mais a un manque avec plus de voix de soutien pour remplir le spectre sonore mieux. Le son global de la chanson et des instruments de musique est bien exécuté, et se mélange en parfaite synchronisation avec la musique. Dans l’ensemble, une bonne chanson qui sonne bien et qui est très bien interprétée. Le n’est rien de mal que j’ai pu trouver avec la chanson car c’est une bonne pièce musicale. Juste l’échantillon est beaucoup trop court que vous avez présenté.

Si vous êtes intéressé à obtenir signé et obtenir du marketing de la musique, alors s’il vous plaît contactez-nous à mon adresse e-mail ci-dessous pour discuter du budget que vous pouvez avoir disponible pour la promotion et la commercialisation de votre musique.

Avandé Music est une société de distribution qui diffuse vos chansons dans des magasins de musique en ligne tels qu’Apple Music, Amazon, Beatport, Beatsource, Deezer, Google Play, iHeartRadio, Juno Digital, Music Net/Medianet, Napster, Qobuz, Shazam, Soundcloud, Spotify, Traxsource, YouTube et plus encore. Il y a des frais mensuels de 5 $ (cinq dollars des États-Unis) par mois pour les libérations illimitées. Ce qui signifie que vous vendez toutes vos chansons, et nous libérons vos chansons dans les magasins de musique du monde entier en ligne.

Le vôtre en musique

Daniel Van Eyk
BA (Hons) Production musicale et ingénierie sonore
Point Blank Music School et Middlesex University 

Avandé Music
avandemusic1@gmail.com

English


Hello Lortigo / Thibaut 
 
Please note that comment is my professional opinion as a music producer and audio engineer. Nothing is personal, but only direct advice and thoughts of the song's possible improvement. Also comments on what is better about the song, and also what could be better yet.

Your song "Lortigo Festival Belgium" has a good introduction with good Psy Trance music. The sound of the song is good to enjoy with good bass and drum instruments, which is well-played throughout the song. 

As for the sampled voice, this  is a basic good male voice sample. The voice fits the song but has a lack with more back-up vocals to fill the sound spectrum better. The overall sound of the song and musical instruments are well-performed, and blends in perfect sync with the music. Overall a good song that does sound good and is very well-performed. The is nothing wrong I could find with the song as it is a good musical piece. Just the sample is much too short which you presented.

Should you be interested in getting signed and getting music marketing, then please contact us at my email address below to discuss what budget you may have available for promotion and marketing your music.

Avandé Music is a distribution company getting your songs to music stores online such as Apple Music, Amazon, Beatport, Beatsource, Deezer, Google Play, iHeartRadio, Juno Digital, Music Net/Medianet, Napster, Qobuz, Shazam, Soundcloud, Spotify, Traxsource, YouTube and more. There is a monthly fee of $5 (Five United States Dollars) per month for unlimited releases. Meaning you sell all your songs, and we release your songs to music stores worldwide online.


Yours in Music

Daniel Van Eyk
BA (Hons) Music Production and Sound Engineering
Point Blank Music School & Middlesex University 

Avandé Music 
avandemusic1@gmail.com

Une chanson pop-urbaine avec un fort penchant pour les sonorités électroniques. L'approche lyrique masculine dépeint des instants d'angoisse nocturne, ces moments tourmentés où nos pensées nous laissent aucun répit avant que se termine la nuit. Le refrain accrocheur est appuyé par une production trap bien downtempo et hautement atmosphérique qui véhicule tout un lot d'émotions.

La publication est programmée via la page Facebook le 9 février à 8h sur Montréal. En attendant, voici les liens vers les playlists :
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQQEx2JoJCJub7bxOTvKY6lNHUmA1JV0A

https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4rHuFySD8pspOD8DoehAD4

https://deezer.page.link/TeEKpRaPFhnF6zUs5

Bonjour et merci pour le message,

Le morceau est plein de bonnes idées, musicalement surtout, mais souffre d'un résultat final qui demanderait davantage de précisions.

Il semble très long à démarrer, pour en plus de ça durer 2:21 seulement. Les paroles semble par moments un peu creuses ; ce qui se rattrape par la mélodie alors ce n'est pas bien grave. Néanmoins, si je comprend ce qui assimile votre morceau à du rap, j'ai la sensation qu'on est davantage sur de la chanson associé à du rap, que l'inverse, un titre bien plus proche d'un univers pop / variété. Peut être serai-ce une piste à explorer dans votre quête de relai ?

Force à vous !

Hello l'équipe

Pas mal du tout le morceau "J'ai pas dormi", mais malheureusement il ne sera pas diffusé sur notre site web.

Cordialement l'équipe vipzone

Salut,

Tout d'abord merci pour l'envoie de votre titre.

Ce qu'on peut dire d'un point de vue technique, le morceau est correctement mixé, ras à ce niveau là.

Artistiquement, nous n'avons pas accroché.
C'est trop hésitant sur les placements. Le flow est trop monotone et les lyrics ne nous ont pas vraiment fait rentrer dans le titre. 

Y'a un potentiel mais il faut bosser la technique et chercher à se démarquer de la masse en ayant un vraie originalité tant sur le fond que sur la forme.

Force pour la suite.

Bonjour,

Merci d’avoir fait la démarche de nous envoyer votre dernier morceau.

Morceau correct. Le texte est plutôt bon, mais des carences côté flow. Le refrain est maitrisé et efficace.

Ceci dit, bonne énergie, hâte d'écouter la suite.

Bonne continuation à vous,

Mike

L'équipe

Hey Djay I really liked your song, its very well produced, and maaaaan this girl singing with you made the perfect balance. Your voice is really unique, hard to find someone that sounds like you. A fun Valentine track ! I liked the fusion between electro and reggae! I like the duet, very envigorating ! The video is also fun to watch and gives a karaoke mood ! Salut !

Quelle surprise ! Nous avons beaucoup apprécié ton travail. En effet, on a rien entendu de tel, tu as vraiment une identité marquée et un son bien à toi.

Alors il y a de nombreuses choses à corriger. Tout d'abord, un usage un peu excessif de l'autotune. L'écriture est parfois un peu naïve, essaie de dire les choses moins frontalement. Utilises des images, des métaphores. Peut être faut-il aussi travailler ta structure de rimes.

Tout ça c'est pour améliorer un travail qui est deja bien abouti et prometteur. Tu n'entre pas forcement dans notre style mais nous serions vraiment curieux de voir comment tu vas progresser. Alors n'hésites pas à nous envoyer d'autre titres, directement sur Insta si tu ne veux pas passer par ici.

Bien à toi

Bonjour, et merci pour votre envoie.
On à un gros souci de mixage... je vous conseil de le reprendre. Attention à votre arrangement, on dirait que vous avez utilisez les instruments donnés avec votre DAW et c'est dommage. 
La composition et le coté artistique créatif est très intéressante et pourrait être très exploitable commercialement si l'arrangement était mieux travaillé.

HOLY JESUS. What is this? I'm completely schocked. What a surprise.

Guys, I'm not a big fan of Metal, but this is UNBELIEVABLE. In the beginning I thought I was ready to hear something like Daft Punk or Pet Shop Boys, but this track hits HARD!!!!!!!!!!!!

It reminds me a lot of names on the "new scene" of metal, like old songs by Killswitch Engage, Asking Alexandria, I See Stars, with a glimpse of prog metal, including one of the biggests bands here in Brazil: Angra.

This is sick. I'll for sure write an article about you on our site and will share the song asap on our social media. 

Please, be in touch and count on me for future releases. Send me this EP when it arrives! 

IZZO / ROCKNBOLD.COM

Hello guys! Thank you so much for sharing this amazing track! What incredible riffs !!! I particularly liked the way you chose to build the song's vocals through various backing vocals in addition to the main vocal. I feel that the result made the music much more intense, dark, engaging and energetic, as well as clear, very original. I also like the way the vocals dialogue with the equally intense and well-produced instrumentals. It's really cool how heavy metal finds some electronic elements here. Congratulations on the excellent work! Count on our support to spread the word!
Crazy energy here! Drums sound crazy good, solid energetic and sit really well in the mix, but now we're looking for more electro style. Thanks for sharing!

Hi Andre! Thanks so much for your submission!

My name's Joana and I'm from DØT MAGAZINE's team! I'm gonna be the one writing ♥

I really enjoyed this tune! I'm mesmerise by your voice, what a precious vocal cord! I lost count on how many notes you nailed. The lyrics here are on point as well.

Overall, it's a very interesting song and you did a really good job. Nice production!

As you know, our magazine stands out for having music written in Portuguese. With this said, that's why we will not be sharing your track. 

Wishing you all the best!

Joana
Thank you for your submission.  While pleasant enough, I feel it's a bit too standard rock  and needs to do more to stand out.

Wow - what a gorgeous soundscape from the start, then that vocal just gorgeous as is the melody and the progression of the track.

Sono passati i 7 giorni?
Scherzi a parte, hai fatto un buon lavoro: la canzone suona bene, e secondo me in live dev'essere ancora meglio!
Il testo riesce ad evocare tutte le emozioni che volevi trasmettere, ed il pezzo riesce ad essere in alcune parti anche energico. 
Mi piacerebbe comunque sentirti su qualcosa più vicino al rock che al pop. 
Ad ogni modo,  continua a lavorare sodo!

Ciao Matteo,
grazie per averci chiesto un nostro Feedback per questo tuo brano.
7 Giorni è un brano melanconico, un pop rock d'autore dove la melodia è strutturata in maniera da creare un giusto dinamismo, grazie anche alla linea vocale che si presenta decisa e in alcuni punti con pregevoli picchi di grinta.
Questo è un genere di musica che trova difficoltà ad emergere, perchè ci sono tanti gruppi e artisti come te che trattano questo genere.
Però la giusta costanza l'impegno e la dedizione, fanno la differenza. Artisticamente sei bravo, dunque prosegui così !!
Se sono rose .... fioriranno!!
Un brano pop cantautorale attuale ma sempreverde. ''7 giorni'' descrive bene le sensazioni legate ad un amore finito, senza tralasciare una necessaria dose di ottimismo.

Ciao Matteo,

ho ascoltato il brano un paio di volte. Il testo è molto profondo e si sposa molto bene con il mood malinconico del brano. Il ritornello funziona ed ha un buon potenziale, difatti rimane impresso. Mi piace il tocco rock della chitarra che nel complesso funziona bene. Hai altro materiale inedito? Nel caso sentiti libero di scrivermi

Ciao Matteo,
Grazie per aver condiviso con noi il tuo brano e per, di conseguenza, averci fatto conoscere il tuo progetto musicale! La tua produzione ci sembra assolutamente lodevole sotto il profilo tecnico/sonoro. Forse solo in alcuni punti della strofa (e dello special) la voce sembra leggermente “inghiottita” dalla strumentale, ma è un dettaglio marginale nel contesto di un lavoro a nostro avviso assolutamente ben fatto. Lo condividiamo volentierissimo e rimaniamo a tua disposizione (anche su info@lotusmusic.it) per una consulenza più approfondita se mai avessi bisogno di promozione o co-produzione (noi, oltre all’aspetto musicale, ci occupiamo di promozione web, radio, streaming, di creazione videoclip, ecc). Tra poco ti mandiamo i link con la doppia condivisione Facebook/Spotify. A presto!

Ciao Matteo, grazie intanto per averci contattato.
Ti facciamo i nostri complimenti, il brano funziona, è molto italiano, diremmo ottimo per un festival di Sanremo.
Non ci permettiamo di fare commenti negativi, ma l'unica piccola cosa che ci possiamo permettere di dire che, pur suonato molto bene e arrangiato con grande cura, pensiamo al brano, davvero bello, anche in una veste un pochino più elettronica da renderlo il più attuale possibile.
Sei bravissimo comunque, per noi è un giudizio positivissimo.

Bonjour,

Le Fil Rouge.

Hello

Eric / HomeCooking Share

Bonjour Agnès, merci pour cette proposition, je sens beaucoup de cœur et de sincérité dans votre musique. Néanmoins difficile de dépasser le côté "mignon" de "Paysage", pour aller plus loin dans les textes... Le titre "Mystère" par exemple est plus aventureux dans sa mécanique musicale et rythmique. Pour résumer, ces titres sont très prometteurs mais sont le lieu d'un "en devenir", trouver le bon équilibre entre sobriété et exploration sonore, entre expressivité et respiration.... De notre côté, des artistes comme Klô Pelgag ou Leonie Pernet activent cette alchimie si complexe. En tout cas, merci pour la proposition, au plaisir d'écouter vos prochaines créations. Cordialement, Laurent pour le Chantier.Radio

Moi ca me choque pas spécialement mais je me mets a la place d'un media, label ou autre pro de l'industrie qui reçoit ça, il coupe après le 1er refrain... Et également je t'encourage a gaffer ton écriture. C'est important même si parfois on pourrait croire le contraire. 

Ensuite pour gagner en visibilité, n'hésites pas a faire des freestyle ou participer au concours de rap en ligne sur Insta ou Tiktok. 

Force a toi. 

Peace.

Bonjour, très bonne pièce.

Nous sommes une station de radio/télévision commerciale internationale du Québec, Canada. Affiliée iHeartRadio.
Nous mettons l'emphase sur les artistes émergents canadiens pour les rotations musicales.

Toutefois, nous avons une émission de découvertes internationales et nous allons faire jouer votre pièce. 
L'émission s'intitule "120 minutes autour du monde" et est de 11h am à 13h, heure du Québec, du lundi au vendredi.
Votre chanson va apparaître une fois lors de la présentation découverte de la semaine, ensuite elle va rejouer au
hasard des autres épisodes futurs.

Avant que je puisse vous dire quand vous serez diffusé, j'aurais besoin des informations suivantes:
- Votre track (plus simple dans groover svp)
- Lien de votre page Facebook **PRO**  (Important, si vous ne l'avez déjà indiqué dans votre profil Groover) Si c'est déjà là c'est parfait. Avoir une page Facebook est un élément-clé de notre marketing pour vous faire connaître. Il doit s'agir une "Page" Facebook et non un compte personnel.
- Si vous avez une vidéo clip, fournir la vidéo clip également comme 2e fichier: Wetransfer ou service du genre à mtdallaire@notremedia.com

Vous devriez passer à notre émission "120 minutes autour du monde" dans les 30 jours suivant la réception de toutes vos informations, mais pas avant la date de diffusion que vous avez indiquée dans Groover, donc assurez-vous que la date est bonne.

Lorsque votre chanson sera partagée, vous serez avisé.
Il y aura une publication Facebook dans laquelle vous serez identifié et lorsque l'on traite votre dossier Groover, nous vous aviserons également.
Vous serez avisé pour le passage à l'épisode des découvertes, mais pas lors des autres épisodes.
Une plateforme sera bientôt disponible pour vous permettre d'auto-créer votre entrevue et présentation qui sera diffusée.

Merci pour la découverte. 

https://niky.ca ou avec l'application iHeartRadio
(ou sur notre page Facebook https://www.facebook.com/nikyradiointernational/ )

Musicalement, c'est pas trop mal, vive le power chord, par contre niveau chant et texte, je trouve ça pas terrible. C'est pas toujours très juste, et puis bon, critiquer le style de vie des autres pendant toute une chanson, je trouve pas ça très glamour. En toute objectivité, j'ai pas écouté le reste, mais tu devrais te trouver un autre single promotionnel.

Toute activité a le sens qu'on lui accorde, c'est très subjectif et lié à la sensibilité de tout un chacun. Rester toute sa vie devant un écran et peindre des figurines n'a pas moins de sens que de faire les trois huit dans une usine pour un patron qui ne connaît même pas ton existence.
Bonne énergie, approche musicale intéressante. En revanche, le décalage entre la compo et l'interprétation m'a désarçonné. Je passe mon tour pour cette raison.

Ciao Bosna, Grazie per avermi inviato la canzone ma io non sono un giornalista quindi non posso offrirti né una intervista né una recensione.

Ciao Bosna Danì, grazie per averci inviato la tua produzione. L'ho ascoltata più volte prima di darti un feedback ma purtroppo non mi convince molto come traccia. Riconosco che è ben lavorata, si vede che c'è un'idea sotto e apprezzo molto la bellezza e la pulizia dei suoni che hai scelto. Non c'è in nessun momento confusione, sono ben bilanciati in tutta la traccia. Il "problema" se vogliamo, è che non mi piace: non mi piace la voce né la struttura della traccia: non sono riuscito ad apprezzare fino in fondo (o a recepirlo forse) quello che volevi comunicare. La traccia è ricca di tensione e di "colpi di scena" e questo non mi fa impazzire. Preferisco altre sonorità. Inoltre, non riesco a visualizzare un contesto per questa traccia, se non un'esibizione dal vivo: potrebbe forse essere usata in un film o in una serie, ma sicuramente siamo sul concettuale, allontanandoci dalla dimensione dancefloor e radio. Mi dispiace di non poterti supportare e ti auguro il meglio e un grande in bocca al lupo per il futuro. Un saluto.

Ciao, sì ci è piaciuta la sperimentazione e l'accostamento dei suoni, siamo d'accordo con la tua descrizione. Per quanto riguarda interviste o recensioni, noi possiamo solo annunciare le uscite rap italiane, dunque se vorrai essere annunciato con qualche futura pubblicazione dovresti farcelo sapere almeno dalla settimana prima e ti invieremo le regole

Hi  MADSUN :)

My name is Paige, from GNH Records. Thank you so much for submitting Discovery to us to consider for our Apple Music + Spotify playlist, Futurepop. It's our home for  "cutting-edge pop acts who nimbly genre-blend with clever, subversive sound design, ultramodern hip-hop or pioneering alternative R&B." Here are the links to follow / share it:
- Spotify: urlgeni.us/spotify/NgzB 
- Apple Music: urlgeni.us/applemusic/7jUt 

I realise it's a valuable use of credits to do this here, so we've taken a very close listen to Discovery and want to provide you this constructive feedback on your submission.
 
There's heaps we love about this track. Sound design is top notch; the little stereo-ping-ponged bells in the breakdown. The tasteful sub bass underscoring the pads. The vibrant percussion keeping the groove throughout the builds. The emotive strings, and the mid-tempo heavily sidechained kick-snare beat of the "drop". The dancing octave strings.

Ultimately, while it impressed us, unfortunately the main thing this missed to be a Futurepop track was enough vocal. It was quite minimal on lyrics, with no verse/chorus vocal to hold it to the pop category. As such, it's more of an electronic track, not a pop track and therefore not an appropriate match. For Futurepop, we're consciously trying to be a real point of difference, looking for singles that push themselves into a bolder niche, taking innovative risks with more synthetic sound design or atypical arrangements, while still being grounded by very strong pop fundamentals. When you play through the first few artists we've selected for the playlist, you'll hear what we mean. We try to elevate the playlist beyond systemic commercial R&B/pop. I think you will easily find some major success with playlists and blogs that do focus on electronic music more broadly, though.

One other thing I can offer you, is a bit of an industry connection. One of our managed artists is Spectoral (@spectoral on Instagram) who co-curates the playlist with us. In fact, it lives on his artist account. So while I can't offer you a placement on the playlist, if you're an artist who is interested in creating music for the bleeding-edge, an artist who is a music addict like us, who shares our tastes, and always aspires to keep tabs on the most current sounds, then I'd strongly encourage you to DM @spectoral - on Instagram. Introduce yourself to him and send him your link. Tell him you spoke to Paige on Groover. He's real nice, a well connected producer and curator from Australia who is a true passionate new music addict himself. He's also a committee member of a not-for-profit (free) organisation called Beat Collective (beatcollective.net) that is one of the biggest artist-producer communities in the world. So he meets a LOT of artists and it's very valuable to be connected. So even if that doesn't result in you getting added to a playlist, you should still get some good value out of at least talking to him, a like-minded artist who values building good industry connections.

Go for it! :)

Paige R
GNH

Une entraînante et envoûtante chanson électropop avec une sonorité vaporeuse un peu vintage extrêmement atmosphérique. Ponctuée d'élans vocaux féminins au ton à la fois sensuel et empreint de mystère, ce titre évoque la nostalgie. Cette pièce rappelle à la fois Air, Arnaud Rebotini et Scratch Massive pour ses éléments synthétiques qui rencontrent des textures organiques. Une oeuvre visuelle et sonore orgasmique et intemporelle!

Ciao Edoardo,

ti parla Guido, del reparto A&R di Grifo Dischi.
Ho ascoltato il tuo brano. Ad un primo ascolto ho apprezzato la spontaneità e la naturalezza della voce, che presenta dei tratti caratterizzanti e delle scelte stilistiche interessanti. Peccato, forse, per l'eccessivo utilizzo di "bad words", che allontanano l'ascoltatore dalla dimensione intima del brano. Capisco la ricerca di un tipo di cantato quasi "parlato", ma una scelta del genere dovrebbe arricchire la composizione, piuttosto che rischiare di sminuirla o impoverirla.

Per quello che concerne la produzione, ho delle riserve sul balance del mix (la voce esce molto fuori rispetto al resto, che passa quasi in secondo piano, non riuscendo così a conferire un corretto sviluppo dinamico); ed in particolare sul suono del pianoforte, un po' troppo cheap. 

Detto questo, qualora potesse interessarti, attualmente Grifo Dischi è attiva anche come agenzia. In questa veste, ci occupiamo di seguire progetti che comunque riteniamo interessanti, al fine di accompagnarli nel loro percorso artistico e di fornirgli tutti i mezzi necessari per uscire sul mercato discografico attuale in maniera ponderata ed efficace. L'etichetta è in grado di coprire tutti quegli aspetti che ritengo indispensabili per un progetto: dalla direzione artistica al master, dal management alla distribuzione; sfruttando le nostre competenze professionali ed il nostro consolidato network di collaboratori e professionisti addetti ai lavori, siamo in grado di garantire ai progetti con cui collaboriamo dei risultati sensibili.

Vedo che sei già uscito con questo lavoro, ma nel caso in cui avessi altro materiale, potresti contattarci per avere ulteriori delucidazioni in tal senso. 

Per il momento ti auguro un grande in bocca al lupo.
A presto,

G.
Così delicato e strappa anima da confonderci piacevolmente. Degno di nota è ovviamente il titolo, non potevi trovare di meglio. Continua così!

Hi!

"Step in the Arena" is a good track, it combines elements of rock, alternative metal, hip hop and electronic music, and it also has some interesting vocals added to this very eclectic instrumental.

I've listened to the song a few times and to my ears it sounds like a very confusing mix of various distinct elements that didn't really work out together. As we've seen before, with Linkin Park and other acts that blended electronic elements with hip hop and alternative metal, it can be done, it's not impossible but it's not an easy trick to pull off. Unfortunately, all the elements used in your track are absolutely great on their own, but when put together, they lose their impact almost entirely. It's like a bunch of non-related tracks laid onto another without much thought given to it.

Thanks for sending the track, be safe and keep on!

LA-based rock band, Love Ghost announces a 4-song EP dropping February 5th

Love Ghost is an indie/alternative/hard rock band consisting of Finnegan Bell (guitar and vocals), Daniel Alcala (Guitar), Ryan Stevens (Bass and background vocals) Samson Young (drums and background vocals) and Cory Batchler (keyboards).
Their new EP 'Sabertoothed' is the work of the band  and producer Danny Saber (Rolling Stones, Marilyn Manson, David Bowie). The songs, written pre-pandemic, mix Emo feels, and guitar-driven alternative rock.
"Step In The Arena"  is about standing up for yourself when people try to tear you down.

Considero a faixa regular, está tudo lugar, mas ela não marca. Me soa muito comum, apesar de alguns acertos. Sinto que falta de mais força. Um refrão mais marcante, um arranjo mais ousado, uma alternância no riff, enfim. Há um caminho interessante para se trilhar. As interferências que surgem em meio à faixa são bons, mas no todo é repetitivo. 

I consider the track regular, everything is in place, but it doesn't score. It sounds very common to me, despite some successes. I feel a lack of strength. A more striking chorus, a more daring arrangement, an alternation in the riff, in short. There is an interesting path to take. The interferences that appear in the middle of the track are good, but on the whole it is repetitive.

I confess that at the beginning it sounded quite strange, many electronic elements that led to Nu Metal, and vocal did not please much at first but it gradually became interesting, the thing is to always be open to knowing new sounds, it is a risky bet to invest in the mixture of electro with rock even though it is not something new, and in my humble opinion a vocal without effects would have more impact, because the music in general is very good!

J'avoue qu'au début ça sonnait très étrange, beaucoup d'éléments électroniques qui ont conduit à Nu Metal, et la voix ne plaisait pas beaucoup au début mais c'est devenu progressivement intéressant, l'important est d'être toujours ouvert pour connaître de nouveaux sons, c'est un risque de miser sur le mélange de l'électro avec du rock même si ce n'est pas nouveau, et à mon humble avis une voix sans effets aurait plus d'impact, car la musique en général est très bonne!

Confesso que no começo soava bem estranho, muitos elementos eletrônicos que levaram ao Nu Metal, e o vocal não agradou muito no começo mas aos poucos foi ficando interessante, o importante é estar sempre aberto para conhecer novos sons, é um risco apostar na mistura do electro com o rock mesmo que não seja uma novidade, e na minha humilde opinião um vocal sem efeitos teria mais impacto, porque a música em geral é muito boa!

Hello!

Thanks so much for requesting us to review your track. We really enjoyed how you're sort of breaking the mold of traditional rock here. Mixing up the sounds of alternative and emo with surprises thrown in here and there made for a really nice listen. This song features a little bit of everything which was really great, we'll definitely be checking out the EP once it's released.

Additionally, we'd love to check you out on Instagram if you have one. Feel free to follow us at ours: @wewriteaboutmusic

Take care!

You got me intrigued in the intro, once you started sing i was surprised!
Didn't thought to hear autotune in a track of this genre but here you are!
The songs feels modern and why not, pretty 21pilots-esque, i really enjoyed the small tweaks to the musical line around 3.25 as well.
The lyrics brings you to another dimension, and your voice is fine, even though maybe the autotune itself was not essential. 
Overall a good track, i feel like you album will worth a listen!

Sincerely, Jacques

Hello,

Keep up the good work!!

Cheers,

Florin Ignat

We would say the production quality is 9/10, the instrumentals are fire, the harmony is pleasing, but we think you could've use reduced the use of autotunes in it.

The lyrics don't really say anything to us, it is not relatable, and of course, to be relatable is not a rule to be followed in the music universe, people sing about the most unusual things we all can imagine, but the problem here is that we also didn't get involved by what you're suggesting in "Step In The Arena" specifically. It is so metaphoric that makes it really hard to be touched by it.

The idea for a lyric video is nice, but it is hard to read the inicial and last word of each line because they kind of blend with the dark background.

At 3:28 minutes there's also this editing problem with the lyrics on top of each other, we cant read what's written.

We know it's hard to listen some negative feedback over something we really care, but here we must be sincere to our experience as listeners of the songs that come for us, we hope you understand and don't be mad.

Hey guys! Nice work!!! Loved the beggining! Also the guitar! Damn! Sweet rock'n roll! Our page is dadicated to alternative music from Latin America, but still, we really appreciate your submission! Greetings from Brasil, wish you the best for your career! ❤

Hello NTHNL, thank you for sending us your track. I like the idea of the "breathe" and I try to sync myself with the track. In my opinion this is a classic "ouverture" track, the first track of a LP or the B-side of a EP. There is a lot of tension in this work and when the flute coming, it give a special acid touch at the track. The sound of flute, combined with the breath (that is like an OM-inidian sound) give more tension at the track. Normally the flute is a sweet and simple sound but, in this track, it is hard and rough. I don't know how to categorize your track and I'm not sure i like it, It is a very good introduction to other music but...

Salut ! Ravi que vous me partagez votre son et votre profil ! 

Pour commencer, je suis super investit sur GROOVER, donc dès que je reçois un son, je cherche à connaître vraiment l’univers complet de l’artiste. Donc je lis vos informations, votre profil, je vais écouter ce que vous faites déjà etc… Pour avoir un vrai avis construit, cohérent et structurer, c’est ce que j’ai fait ;)

Je m’intéresse vraiment à la musique, à tout ce qui se fait dans le Game, donc déjà ce qui est sur, je note ton Blaz et je vais continuer à te suivre.

En ce qui concerne le son que je viens de découvrir, voici mon avis personnelle.

C'est vraiment très propre, y'a tout de manière pro : Flow, Mix, Gimmick... Je pense que sur TikTok le son pourrait vraiment bien marcher !

Un bon mélange que l'ont connait dans notre rap francophone, Koba la D (sans prendre en compte le physique 😅), Oboy, une nonchalance faisant penser a Zola. Le flow peut en intéresser plus d'un, il manque sûrement plus de visibilité, donc on vous laisses la possibilité de nous contacter pour voir ce que l'ont peut vous proposer !

Merci pour l'envoi du morceau. La production est de très bonne qualité même si j'avoue avoir moins succombé à la mélodie et au flow sans doute car je suis plus fan d'un rap plus doux et atmosphérique / pop style Nelick. Je vous souhaite en tout cas le meilleur pour la sortie.

Ciao ragazzi,

sempre bello ascoltare qualcuno che crede ancora nel rock. Interessante la presenza del flauto nella band, un po' meno quel suono "acquoso" un po' troppo anni '80 / primi '90. Non è un cattivo pezzo. Aspetto il prossimo singolo.

Con affetto, 

Andrea Mariano

Ciao ragazzi
Ho ascoltato con attenzione.
Allora, partiamo dall'inizio. Questo è un genere che oggi non va, e quindi per riuscire ad ottenere attenzione, bisogna o rivolgersi ad un target ben definito, oppure cercare di mescolarlo con un vestito che abbia una forma adattabile ai nostri tempi.
L'arrangiamento è molto classic, e riprende molto la modalità con cui tra fine '80 e primi '90 si riprende il prog e il rock degli anni '70. E alla fine, se il genere è quello, poco si può fare. Cercherei di essere più esplosivo nelle aperture dei ritornelli, di utilizzare delle sonorità per la batteria, in fase di mixaggio, meno italiane, ma più internazionali. Il finale, in particolare, non esplode. Il cantante dovrebbe essere più esplosivo e invece mi rimane a metà strada. Il tutto, comunque, considerando l'ottima capacità musicale evidente dei singoli musicisti, rimane un peccato. 
Infine, dato che il genere è quello, non dei nostri tempi, ma giustamente lo stile va lasciato tale, si dovrebbe intervenire sui testi, che anche questi sono troppo retrospettivi. Oggi il testo deve essere immaginifico: creare immagini solo mediante le parole. Qui manca, e su quello secondo me si può cercare di intervenire in maniera energica, ottenendo ottimi risultati.

Un saluto da Roma
Giovanni

The music arrives after two years of maturation and reflects the maturity as an artist and as a person, after a difficult relationship, Sílvia presents with the song “Quisera”, her new musical phase. With a cello in the background to give all the drama that the song calls for, the percussion marks the bar that resembles a modern tango. Sílvia Tardin, who plans to release other singles in 2021.

Silvia, que voz linda! Que classe e elegância na melodia, na letra, na sua maneira de conduzir o tema.

Amei o contraste da suavidade vocal e da força com que você transmite a mensagem.

Excelente!

A dinâmica do arranjo sublinha bem o próprio caminho da canção, realçando tensões. Mais do que sublinhar, na verdade, o arranjo valoriza a melodia e a letra, que é o elo mais fraco da composição - os versos não resolvem a potência dramática que parece haver ali.

Oi Silvia, tudo bem?

Sua bela voz está muito bem acompanhada: adorei muito o arranjo de "Quisera". Acho que o tempo que vocês ficaram debruçados sobre a canção, produzindo, resultou em um trabalho de extrema qualidade, que se conecta com a tradição, mas consegue soar... novo. Parabéns, você está começando essa sua nova fase de maneira bastante especial, e o que posso lhe dizer agora é que esse primeiro passo foi acertadíssimo. Não sei como estão seus planos futuros (clipe? outros singles? álbum cheio?), mas tentarei te acompanhar para saber. No site que edito a gente não fala de singles, eu valorizo muito o projeto todo fechado, o conceito, e gosto da ideia de singles como cartas convite para algo maior, que é o que espero de você agora. Parabéns, mesmo :)

Nossa! Que voz linda!

Parabéns! Muito sucesso

As influências latinas realmente são bem fortes, tem algo meio tango na melodia que me deixou realmente encantado. A quebra aos 1:37 é sensacional. E sua voz é incrível, além de super combinar com a sonoridade da música. Meus parabéns!

Escutamos sua música: bonita composição, parabéns! Realmente é uma música com uma carga emocional bem forte, e um arranjo que valoriza muito bem isso. A influência latina é visível, e combina bem com o espírito da música! 

Vamos incluir agora em nossa playlist “Brasounds Picks: New & Interesting Music”, e compartilhar no stories do Instagram.

Te desejamos muito sucesso, é uma ótima música! 

Um abraço!

Uau, que voz, que letra, que música, que produção musical. Dá pra ver que cada detalhe foi muito bem pensado. Essa música é a cara do Brasil. Pena que o estilo que tocamos é diferente, senão aproveitaríamos em nossa programação. Sua voz é de uma leveza incrível. Passa uma tranquilidade imensa. Invista nas redes sociais e em rádios. Esse talento não pode ser perdido. Muito sucesso pra você!

Que voz incrível, Silvia. Que prazer receber isso!

Conta com a gente!

Olá Sílvia, tudo bem? 

Primeiramente parabéns pelo lançamento de Quisera, sua voz é linda e com certeza é um processo que dá um frio na barriga imenso.

Olá, obrigado por confiar no nosso trabalho.

Adorei a latinidade da música, a voz forte casou muito bem com a intensa melodia que a música tem, assim como a letra. A canção está toda em sintonia e com ÓTIMA produção, excelente arranjo e com um tempo ótimo de minutagem, suficiente para absorver toda a canção, parabéns

Excelente canção. Muito bem masterizada e mixada. A voz se envolve com a excelente sonoridade e a poesia visceral. Desejo sucesso na caminhada e espero acompanhar os próximos lançamentos também.
Vamos incluir na playlist VERÃO MBV 2021

Olá, tudo certo? Feliz por ter recebido sua faixa. Vamos ao feedback?

A estética da canção é muito interessante e acompanhada com os vocais precisos, criam uma atmosfera muito envolvente. Pra concluir, os arranjos que se apresentam de forma minimalista complementam a canção de forma satisfatória. 

Ficamos interessados na sua faixa e vamos compartilha-lá em nossa playlist "Indica" no Spotify!

Obrigado!
Oi Silvia, tudo bem? Muito bacana o seu single de estreia, com essa pegada de tango. Letra boa e a interpretação também. Fico no aguardo do material, parabéns!

Em meio a tantas músicas que recebemos do mundo todo, é tão bom voltar para casa e receber projetos da nossa terra natal. A sensação de familiaridade é algo que nos aproxima e torna todo processo de audição mais interessante. 

Logo que a introdução da música começa, já é possível compreender qual será o "mood" que permeia toda a música, mesmo que ela comece de forma bastante sutil. Com uma instrumentação muito interessante, o arranjo vai se desdobrando de forma gradual mas muito potentemente, como se fosse lentamente esquentando, sempre conduzida pela melodia feita pela voz. A influência latina fica muito clara durante toda música, mas ao mesmo tempo a identidade e os ritmos brasileiros também estão sempre em evidência. 

O timbre de sua voz me remete fortemente à de uma cantora que admiro muito, Vanessa Moreno. Não quero fazer comparações ou juízo de valor, mas é muito bacana ver como as influências podem vir de várias formas e jeitos, e às vezes até inconscientemente. Não sei se você traz ela como referência para o seu trabalho, mas não tive como não fazer essa correlação!

Pessoalmente, a track me agradou muito, é dinâmica, envolvente e com um certo toque de suspense. Nos aspectos técnicos, tudo me parece muito bem produzido, volumes equilibrados, equalização ótima, já que é possível escutar todos os elementos e as cores com muita discernimento. 

Vamos adicionar sua música a nossa playlist do Spotify! Parabéns pelo trabalho e obrigado por compartilhar sua música com a gente.

Música sexy com uma letra bem envolvente. A voz da Sílvia é incrílve e a artista utiliza muito bem todas as variações que seu talento oferece. Os instrumentos criam um ambiente quente latino que casa muito bem com a voz da artista. Parabéns! Quero ouvir mais de você!
Very good, I really liked the music, and the whole production, we will certainly include it in our playlist on Spotify!

Thank you for sharing this! I really dig the overall aesthetic and I think you have some pretty cool moments. Ciao John Bedbrought! Innanzitutto grazie per averci contattato!
Abbiamo ascoltato la tua "What A Man", che ci ha lasciati decisamente interdetti...
Tu hai una voce pazzesca! Un timbro molto bello e particolare, sei intonato, padroneggi bene la dinamica, interpreti bene il testo del tuo brano. Ottima performance canora, davvero complimenti!
Le sonorità scelte sono molto moderne, all'inizio del brano eravamo curiosi di come si sarebbe sviluppato l'arrangiamento, cosa che in realtà non avviene mai per come ci aspettavamo e speravamo.
Ci piace molto il concetto "less is more" adottato, che valorizza all'ennesima potenza la tua voce. Produrre un brano del genere, che non stanca e risulta interessante per tutta la sua durata, nonostante la ritmica quasi assente, è molto complicato.
Per quanto in realtà ci siano elementi melodici, seppur molto rarefatti e il brano sia in linea con produzioni moderne di alto livello, a nostro gusto, sentiamo l'assenza di un'apertura, anche minima, anche breve, che potrebbe valorizzare ulteriormente il brano.
Il mix suona bene, le basse sono giuste e gli effetti sulla voce sono efficaci e ben distribuiti.
Il tuo brano, complessivamente, ci è piaciuto molto ma, come si dice, "ti manca 1 per fare 31".
Ci piacerebbe ascoltare qualcos'altro del tuo progetto...
In bocca al lupo!

GO Staff

PS: Siamo fan della tua Power Spiritual!

Ciao! Grazie per avermi inviato il tuo brano! Allora... ho trovato le strofe molto belle, a livello di testo, di voce, di musica... però il ritornello mi ha un po' spiazzato, l'ho trovato un po' troppo "amatoriale" diciamo. Però nel complesso il pezzo l'ho trovato davvero bello e interessante, un piacevole ascolto. Lo voglio condividere nelle mie storie su Instagram!

Ciao, il pezzo è piacevole, il ritmo e la melodia restano abbastanza in testa ma ci appare un po' troppo approssimativo nella produzione e un po' troppo simile rispetto ad altri dell'ultima ondata it-pop. Tuttavia, pensiamo che ci possano essere margini di miglioramento. Attendiamo altri pezzi.

Ciao Zero Sei, 

ti parla Alessio, direttore artistico di Grifo Dischi.
Devo dire che, ad un primo ascolto, ho apprezzato la dimensione sonora, a mio avviso molto intima e spontanea anche  grazie ad alcune scelte di arrangiamento. Rimango molto perplesso sul suono della chitarra solista, il fuzz lo rende sgraziato, a mio avviso, e  "scollato" dal contesto. Un altro dubbio riguarda la parte di batteria, che sicuramente si lega perfettamente con l'approccio ritmico della voce; ma che, al contempo, necessiterebbe di una costruzione migliore, magari attraverso l'inserimento del charleston quantomeno nella seconda strofa. Questo aiuterebbe sia a dare movimento alla parte ritmica sia a garantire maggiore dinamica.

Il sound resta attuale ed interessante, non so... ti chiederei se avessi altro da ascoltare, in modo da potermi fare un'idea migliore.
Ti lascio la nostra email interna:

info@grifodischi.it

Prova a scriverci lì.
Un abbraccio e a presto,

A.
.

Premetto che l'indie italiano da parecchio tempo sforna progetti interessanti, con buone idee, testi belli e frasi che ti fanno pensare.

Il brano, considerato tutto, lo trovo buono, acerbo, ma con diversi spunti. La produzione non la trovo al top. Sicuramente, le scelte sono state pensate e dosate, ma rimango dell'idea che con un altro approccio e lavoro di produzione potevamo ascoltare una vera Hit... a parere mio.
Morale, hai tutte le carte in regola per un lancio nel panorama indipendete e non solo... la sostanza c'è, bisogna dargli una forma.
Rimaniamo in contatto.

Ciao Zerosei,
ti ringraziamo per aver condiviso con noi la tua musica. Purtroppo il motivo di questa traccia è simile ad un'altra più famosa. 
Ti consigliamo di lavorare un po' di più su una tua ricerca personale per portare avanti il tuo progetto.

Grazie mille e buona musica

Ciao Domiziano, è un vero piacere fare la tua conoscenza e salire sul tuo “Sommergibile”.
Il brano non brilla per originalità, è vero, gira su accordi classicissimi e ovviamente si butta in una mischia dove la concorrenza è numerosa e spietata (forse di peggio c’è solo la trap…). L’indie pop da cameretta, ottima definizione devo dire, si sente tutto. Il testo è quello che fa la differenza; ok, non è Dostoevskij o Quasimodo ma a una canzone pop si chiede immediatezza, freschezza e idee originali ben espresse.
Le parole non devono sembrare scritte con il vocabolario messo accanto, bisogna trasmettere spontaneità e invogliare all'ascolto scorrendo in modo naturale, senza forzature e inciampi.
In Sommergibile tutto questo c’è; in più si sentono tutti i tuoi diciannove anni, sia nell'entusiasmo, nella fragranza della gioventù che – naturalmente – nella inesperienza.
La metrica è rivedibile a tratti, la dinamica della voce è incostante e la dizione andrebbe curata con più attenzione; metti spesso l’accento sulla seconda sillaba e ti mangi la parte finale della parola (ah, questi romani!).
Il brano strutturalmente non è affatto male, potrebbe essere leggermente accorciato senza che si senta la mancanza di nulla visto che negli ultimi 40 secondi si pasticcia un po’.
Non specifichi se lo hai registrato in casa o meno ma spero di sì, dato che i suoni e il mix purtroppo sono di livello molto basso. La voce è sparatissima a tratti e il suono degli strumenti andrebbe curato molto di più. La musica da cameretta deve essere una attitudine artistica, va bene un suono scarno e lo-fi ma deve essere sempre voluto e curato.
Mi piacerebbe farti delle domande e darti qualche consiglio, visto che sono sicuro che sei molto ricettivo su questi argomenti. Sei sicuro che sia una buona idea uscire con un brano sui social senza avere ancora costruito un minimo di fan base? E non credi che esordire con un prodotto di qualità ti aiuterebbe ad acquisirne una con maggiore facilità?
Ecco, se andiamo a vedere come si muovono gli Artisti giovanissimi che fanno numeri (indipendentemente dal genere) ci accorgiamo che il loro ingresso sulle piattaforme avviene quando in un modo o nell’altro sono già riusciti ad avere un bel seguito su Youtube e Instagram (di Facebook agli inizi se ne può fare a meno, è più da “vecchi”). Capisco benissimo comunque la tua voglia di metterti in gioco e avere un minimo di riscontro. Solo chi non fa niente non sbaglia mai, quindi meglio fare!
Adesso devi rimboccarti le maniche e metterti al lavoro sui social!
Ti auguro un enorme in bocca al lupo e ti faccio i miei complimenti; la stoffa c’è, ora bisogna studiare!

Hello Telemaque,

Merci pour la sollicitation !
Musicalement, le titre manque selon moi de variations dans la mélodie et la voix. En termes d'image, l'univers n'est pas assez lisible. Il est important de définir sa musique avec des mots mais aussi avec des images, en commençant par des mots-clefs et un moodboard, pour illustrer le projet. La pochette pour exemple, ne me semble pas assez raccord avec la musique.

Je vous conseillerais donc de préciser l'identité visuelle, et de vous concentrer sur votre Instagram en y postant que des contenus visuels cohérents entre eux et avec votre musique, pour commencer. C'est une vitrine importante de votre travail.

Bon week-end,
Suzon

It's so nice when some tracks begin in a way and take unexpected paths as they develop. When the first notes of the acoustic guitar sounded, I thought it would take a different direction — and I was pleasantly surprised with how it went, especially when the drums arrived. It's worth mentioning that the percussion here made all the difference, as it did a good job holding everything together and bringing some fast-paced rhythm to a subtle song, in a coherent way.

Some of the genres you brought on the description are pretty apparent, but some others might not be that much, and that's actually a good thing in my opinion. Personally, I enjoy it very much when the listener gradually starts discovering some references as I listen to the track. For example, there is definitely a rock vibe in the mood of the song, and there is one moment where it becomes most clear. At 1:48 minute, when there is only the acoustic guitar and subsequently the vocals, is a really good example of some formats used on some very famous rock hits. And, this one specifically reminded me so much of the song "Drive" from Incubus. Not to compare here, but not think of them was almost impossible.

Overall it's a really enjoyable song that many people with different music tastes might enjoy. It's well-produced, well equalized and the volumes of the instrument seem well balanced as well. We are adding this to our playlist on Spotify! Cheers from Brazil and keep going!

Hello! Thank you so much for sending me your track!
"June" is a soft and delicious song to listen to!

The voice combines very well with the proposal of the song, it is in a tone that accompanies the melody of the song and is not conflicting, sounding pleasant to any listener.
The mix was well done, I can distinguish all the elements and subtle variations in the melody, including the slight echo from 2'38 in your voice.
It's a good song, I loved it! You have done an excellent job!

Wish you good luck and success!

Hi _telemaque_ thank you so much for reaching out.  The melody is lovely.  The vocals for now are a bit too rough for me.  I feel like there needs to be a bit more practice vocally, but I can hear that you're so close!!!

I quite enjoy the vibe and pacing here -- real relaxing listen.

I also love the artwork! Maybe you could come up with some cool video following that same visual identity.

However, I think the production might still need a bit of finessing before it can sound truly professional. You'll get there soon enough!

Thank you so much for submitting.
Stay cool,
Coolia.
Salut, désolé mais ce titre est trop en marge de notre ligne éditoriale pour qu'on puisse en parler ou le playlister. Bonne continuation !

Thanks for sharing your music with us, Pierre. Really good pop indie song, really easy listening and very chilled. We are looking forward to your first album which will probably be released in 2021, right? Meanwhile, work on sharing your single with indie music blogs and radios, it will help you a lot when the album launches. It`s a great music to be added to a playlist too, so good to focus on those kinds of media too. It will be great to focus on a "visual" concept/visual identity for telemaque too, so people with recognize it quickly, share it on youtube too. It has great potential, just need to cover those first steps and you will be successful. Good luck and good job!

First of all, I loved the cover art. I found the most intense beat for indie rock, and the melodies with an air of "Radiohead music" interesting. For a first EP, the result is impressive.

Loveable folk-pop, beautiful melody and vocals – the subtle accent makes me think a little bit of Peter, Bjorn & John. Unfortunatelly not exactly the kind of music I’m looking for our playlists at the moment.

Hi Onur

Thanks for sending your works!

Really cool track and vibe. Interesting instrumental and your vocal is spot on. Definitely a groovy track to enjoy in the day, kudos to that! Visuals are awesome aswell. 

However, I would love to hear the vocals as the focus point. I think the instrumental is overpowering the vocals way too much. That might be the intention but that's just my subjective opinion. It really bothered me cause I really wanted to vibe to the vocals more.

Overall solid, strong majestic casual vibes and I love that. I have to pass on this, this time around. I am looking for different sound at this moment and the instrumental is just too strong sound level wise for me to support right now. 

Good luck with your promotion and I wish you all the best! //Nawy
Cool video, the synths are kinda cool but the track seem a little too avant garde for my taste. Thank you for sharing.

Bonjour!
Après un premier titre qui ne m'avait pas convaincu et un autre qui était un peu plus dans mes gouts, ce troisième est un peu à la croisée des chemins. Encore une fois, c'est soigné, ça on ne peut pas le reprocher, le son des guitares notamment est très cool et le jeu assez libre rend le titre assez frais. La basse est cool et sa sonorité est cool et ce cri à la fin du titre m'a fait sourire. Cependant, je n'ai pas trouvé le titre vraiment original. Ca n'est pas désagréable mais je n'ai pas l'impression qu'il va véritablement me rester faute d'un petit truc en plus.

Bonne continuation à vous,

Cool psych offering but we mostly focus on ethereal, aerial, dreamy soundscapes and here I think it was somehow too grounded for us.

Hour After Hour reveals how alternative rock, indie rock, art-rock psych-pop are articulating in perfect harmony but also demonstrates how the independent and underground music scene will develop in the nearest future. Everything about this number is delicate enough to keep your uttermost attention at the profoundly detailed musicianship and the dominant chants, which are certainly fulfilling the atmosphere with unique vibes. The guitars sound like a charm throughout the composition, while the bass guitar provides massiveness to both melodies and the overall atmosphere. The drums could be more detailed, but this is what these particular genres are demanding from the rhythm section, so everything sounds fine. I look forward to seeing how this artist will develop throughout the years. Excellent work!

Bonjour, très bonne pièce encore une fois et heureux de vous revoir.

Si vous avez connu l'émission "NIKY International"
L'émission s'intitule maintenant "120 minutes autour du monde" et est maintenant de 11h am à 13h, heure du Québec, du lundi au vendredi.
Votre chanson va apparaître une fois lors de la présentation découverte de la semaine, ensuite elle va rejouer au
hasard des autres épisodes futurs.

Avant que je puisse vous dire quand vous serez diffusé, j'aurais besoin des informations suivantes:
- Votre track (plus simple dans groover svp)
- Lien de votre page Facebook **PRO**  (Important, si vous ne l'avez déjà indiqué dans votre profil Groover) Si c'est déjà là c'est parfait. Avoir une page Facebook est un élément-clé de notre marketing pour vous faire connaître. Il doit s'agir une "Page" Facebook et non un compte personnel.
- Si vous avez une vidéo clip, fournir la vidéo clip également comme 2e fichier: Wetransfer ou service du genre à mtdallaire@notremedia.com

Vous devriez passer à notre émission "120 minutes autour du monde" dans les 30 jours suivant la réception de toutes vos informations, mais pas avant la date de diffusion que vous avez indiquée dans Groover, donc assurez-vous que la date est bonne.

Lorsque votre chanson sera partagée, vous serez avisé.
Il y aura une publication Facebook dans laquelle vous serez identifié et lorsque l'on traite votre dossier Groover, nous vous aviserons également.
Vous serez avisé pour le passage à l'épisode des découvertes, mais pas lors des autres épisodes.
Une plateforme sera bientôt disponible pour vous permettre d'auto-créer votre entrevue et présentation qui sera diffusée.

Merci pour la découverte. 

https://niky.ca ou avec l'application iHeartRadio
(ou sur notre page Facebook https://www.facebook.com/nikyradiointernational/ )

Hello Magon!

Thanks so much for requesting us to review your track. Really enjoying the sort of spoken word delivery you've got going on here. While the instrumentation does its own thing in the background, mainly the bass line, the story you're telling over it is really nice. We really liked how you'd sort of switch off from singing and speaking. It made for a nice and diverse track that sounds way different from all others. Congrats on this release! Great music video as well.

Additionally, we'd love to check you out on Instagram if you have one. Feel free to follow us at ours: @wewriteaboutmusic

Take care!

First of all, it's hard not to get mesmerized by this fantastic animation. It got me right from the start, it flows so elegantly, the style is so unique, everything seems to be right where it should. Now, sound-wise: I could really feel all the references you brought on the description, but it also reminded me of some other artists like "The Whitest Boy Alive", especially when we are analyzing the timbre of the guitar and the drums. Also, the vocals also brought me to the sound of "Mellow Days" and maybe "Vacations".

The instrumentation is simple but so powerful at the same time, subtle but very incisive as well. This is a very creative way to make the track engaging and catchy for the listener – well, at least it worked pretty well for me. The backing vocals also play a crucial role in this feeling of uniqueness: as the main voice keeps on this "reciting" style of singing, the backing vocals are in a very different place, but in a coherent and complementary manner. 

Personally, I enjoyed this track very much, the technical aspects seem to be very well resolved, the equalization is sharp and it's possible to discern all the colors on it. Overall it's truly well-produced and your artistic identity is apparent and cohesive, hence everything is connected and makes sense as a whole.

You definitely got a new fan from Brazil and we are gladly adding this track to our playlist on Spotify! Congrats on your work and keep going! Cheers.
Thanks for sending! I apologize for the English feedback. I liked this track a lot, and am happy to add it to a Spotify playlist. Link coming shortly. Cheers!

Thanks for sharing your track with us. While we appreciated the soundscape you've created, the song is not a good fit for our "Calming Music + Nature Sounds" playlist. As this track is missing the nature sounds it's not a good fit for us. Thanks again for sharing. All the best and good luck!!!

Hey Elias, I liked the song.

Honestly I have no negative criticism of the music. It's good at everything it sets out to do, always presenting interesting elements to the listener. Good mixing as well. The music is really good.
At the moment, I am listening to the complete album and also enjoying what I am hearing, it reminds me of works of Mayer Hawthorne.
My podcast will be back with new episodes next month and some future program I will for sure talk about your work.

Congratulations!

Bonjour, très bonne pièce.

Nous sommes une station de radio/télévision commerciale internationale du Québec, Canada. Affiliée iHeartRadio.
Nous mettons l'emphase sur les artistes émergents canadiens pour les rotations musicales.

Toutefois, nous avons une émission de découvertes internationales et nous allons faire jouer votre pièce. 
L'émission s'intitule "120 minutes autour du monde" et est de 11h am à 13h, heure du Québec, du lundi au vendredi.
Votre chanson va apparaître une fois lors de la présentation découverte de la semaine, ensuite elle va rejouer au
hasard des autres épisodes futurs.

Avant que je puisse vous dire quand vous serez diffusé, j'aurais besoin des informations suivantes:
- Votre track (plus simple dans groover svp)
- Lien de votre page Facebook **PRO**  (Important, si vous ne l'avez déjà indiqué dans votre profil Groover) Si c'est déjà là c'est parfait. Avoir une page Facebook est un élément-clé de notre marketing pour vous faire connaître. Il doit s'agir une "Page" Facebook et non un compte personnel.
- Si vous avez une vidéo clip, fournir la vidéo clip également comme 2e fichier: Wetransfer ou service du genre à mtdallaire@notremedia.com

Vous devriez passer à notre émission "120 minutes autour du monde" dans les 30 jours suivant la réception de toutes vos informations, mais pas avant la date de diffusion que vous avez indiquée dans Groover, donc assurez-vous que la date est bonne.

Lorsque votre chanson sera partagée, vous serez avisé.
Il y aura une publication Facebook dans laquelle vous serez identifié et lorsque l'on traite votre dossier Groover, nous vous aviserons également.
Vous serez avisé pour le passage à l'épisode des découvertes, mais pas lors des autres épisodes.
Une plateforme sera bientôt disponible pour vous permettre d'auto-créer votre entrevue et présentation qui sera diffusée.

Merci pour la découverte. 

https://niky.ca ou avec l'application iHeartRadio
(ou sur notre page Facebook https://www.facebook.com/nikyradiointernational/ )

Good job with production.
'The Land of Mystery' is unfortunately not a fit with our station, but I'm sure it'll do well on the correct platforms.
All the best with your music!

Great atmosphere! 
The instrumental sounds sick! The arrangement has a great variety of elements. The groove of the instrumental works really well! 
Regarding mixing, you do a good job of creating a clean mix. You do a good job of creating an interesting stereo image. 
The structure is unique. However, it is difficult to follow the structure. Make sure to create clear cuts between sections. 
All in all, a great tune! Try to work on the structure. 

Best wishes,
PAN FM
